data.name: Dragon Skies VR Demo
data.detailed_description:
Upon full release, Dragon Skies VR will have 4 - 7 hours of fully voice acted storyline, over 15 characters, and 10+ missions. This demo is being provided to give fans a taste for how it feels to fly a dragon, and to have story-focused content in VR.

Dragon Skies VR is a story-based RPG/shooter that puts you right in the saddle as your kingdom's sole dragon rider. Mount up and fly your dragon through treacherous valleys and caves, battling with rebel airship pilots that want nothing more than to take you down a notch. With a rich story, living characters, a powerful spell crafting system, and decisions to make that affect the future of the world, you are certain to find yourself immersed with Dragon Skies VR.

The demo provided is an extremely small sample of the overall game. There are 3 levels to play: an open expanse for free-flying, a Soul Seed collecting mission with minimal enemies, and a winding valley with several types of hostile airships. You will also be able to explore the town and your lair, meet some of the characters that will be in the game, and have the opportunity to craft Spells for your Caster Gun.

FoxLeap wants to hear about your experience. Please post on the Dragon Skies VR community hub with questions, comments, or critiques. We are an extremely community-focused game company and would love to hear from you.
